title: DrugStrength
description: A specific strength in which a medical drug is available in a specific country.

strengthUnit.description: The units of an active ingredient's strength, e.g. mg.

activeIngredient.description: An active ingredient, typically chemical compounds and/or biologic substances.

strengthValue.description: The value of an active ingredient's strength, e.g. 325.

maximumIntake.description: Recommended intake of this supplement for a given population as defined by a specific recommending authority.

availableIn.description: The location in which the strength is available.
